role_definition: This service domain allows the bank to apply special pricing terms and conditions that override standard price calculations. These override facilities are to be used in specific situations where a bank level decision is taken to amend prices or pricing terms in response to some major event or business development action
example_of_use: The bank suspends certain product fees during a major brand awareness campaign
executive_summary: Maintain a pricing list or conditions (with ranges and optional terms) categorized by various dimensions to impose exceptional product pricing conditions that override standard pricing terms (for special events/situations)
key_features: Capture authorized override bank pricing terms
Broadcast special terms to interested parties
Confirm terms applied as required in production
